name: get_playlist_metadata
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool spotify_scraper.
Tool description: An all-in-one scraper for scraping everything on Spotify, and a highly available download solution for tracks, lyrics and episode previews.
API description: Fetches full details of a Spotify playlist using RapidAPI.

playlistid.description: The ID of the Spotify playlist.

limit.description: The max number of items returned per request. Defaults to `0`.

offset.description: The number of items to skip before starting to return results. Defaults to None.
